bibl.title: Royal Decree of November 12, 198 B.C. (?) on Sale of Egyptians Enslaved in Unrest .
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.author: Koenen, Ludwig

bibl.note: Letter (unpublished) by the Dioiketes Athenodoros to the agoranomoi instructing them to register the sale of a slave. This document illuminates the Egyptian revolt.
Koenen Ludwig, Royal Decree of November 12, 198 B.C. (?) on Sale of Egyptians Enslaved in Unrest (PMich. Inv. 6947).
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 915-916.
